text: Our Lady of Remedies or The Virgin of Los Remedios is a title of the Virgin Mary. It may refer to: *Church of los Remedios (Guadalajara), Spain *Church of Nuestra Señora de los Remedios (Estremera), Spain *Iglesia de Nuestra Señora de los Remedios, Cholula, Mexico *Nuestra Señora de los Remedios Parish, Philippines *Our Lady of Remedies Cathedral, Riohacha, Colombia **Festivities of Our Lady of the Remedies in Riohacha *Sanctuary of Nuestra Señora de los Remedios in Fuensanta, Spain *Santa Remedios Church, Northern Mariana Islands *Virgen de los Remedios de Pampanga, a title of Mary venerated by Kapampangan Catholics in the Philippines ==See also== *Los Remedios in Seville, Spain, named following a convent in the district *Los Remedios National Park, Mexico
title: Our Lady of Remedies
